posts.title: Linux Distro
posts.text: https://medium.com/@lhennessy/psychedelic-awesome-wm-on-arch-linux-6f8dc053a133 https://blog.csdn.net/minghe_uestc/article/details/7489157 https://forum.suse.org.cn/t/awesome/2047 https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1390999 https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=awesome+i3 https://askubuntu.com/questions/583639/how-can-i-get-rid-of-unknown-display ###manjaro设置sudo pacman -Syyu 升级系统到最新kate /etc/pacman.conf 配置源 国内镜像 包括core extra community multilibsudo pacman-mirrors -i -c China -m rank 更新镜像排名sudo pacman -Syy 更新数据源 archlinuxcn 源 中科大 [archlinuxcn]SigLevel = Optional TrustedOnlyServer = https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/$archsudo pacman -Syyu //更新数据源sudo pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring //安装导入GPG key aur源 修改/etc/yaourtrc，去掉 # AURURL 的注释，修改为 AURURL="https://aur.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn" ###manjaro安装后配置https://www.jianshu.com/p/8761912a1b01

posts.title: Docker
posts.text: 安装docker sudo apt-get install docker.io 获取镜像 docker pull ubuntu:14.04 查看本机存在哪些镜像 docker images 导出容器 docker export $container_id > 容器快照名.tar 导入容器 docker 清理空间 docker system df docker system prune 安装 https://blog.csdn.net/u010889616/article/details/80170767 https://www.daocloud.io/mirror 用户名密码zhoubing Abc123456

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
